item.content:encoded:
BYOB

ABOUT

BYOB is not just another burger joint—it’s a creative culinary playground designed for Gen Z. At BYOB, you’re the chef, with endless possibilities to craft your perfect burger. From the juiciest patties to the freshest, trendiest toppings, every choice is yours.
BYOB is all about freedom, fun, and flavor, reflecting the bold and expressive spirit of Gen Z. Whether you’re craving a classic or something totally unexpected, BYOB is where you come to build a burger that’s as unique as you are.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Packaging Design

INDUSTRY

Food Industry

CHALLENGES

Choose
Your Toppings

01

Designing an identity that emphasizes on the build your own burger concept

02

Making the brand look unique in the market among other Fast-food joints

03

Creating illustrations to show the fresh aspect even though it’s Fast-food

04

Building a brand identity that is cohesive and memorable

SOLUTION

Playful Approach

Every element of the BYOB brand, from the bold, hand-drawn aesthetics to the personalized topping choices, captures the essence of a dynamic burger experience. It’s all about empowering customers to be the boss of their burger masterpiece. Come on over, get creative, and let’s burger it up, your way!

Crafted
Deliciousness

IDENTITY

The logo, with “BYOB” in a groovy, melted cheese font, exudes a playful,
street-style vibe that speaks directly to a vibrant, millennial audience.

IMPACT

We know
how to crack it

The branding for BYOB has significantly elevated the brand’s presence, resonating deeply with its target audience. The groovy, melted cheese font and street-style vibe have not only made the logo instantly recognizable but also created an emotional connection with customers. This fun, bold identity has made BYOB stand out in a crowded market, attracting a loyal following that appreciates the freedom and creativity the brand offers. By aligning the visual identity with the customizable experience, the branding has effectively communicated BYOB’s core values, leading to increased customer engagement and a stronger brand community.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Terra Lapis

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Terra Lapis is a boutique architecture firm renowned for its blend of international flair and deep local insight. With over three decades of leadership, we integrate cutting-edge technology for superior project delivery and visualization. Our designs make bold statements, fusing global aesthetics with traditional values, emphasizing quality, transparency, and unwavering integrity.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

Architecture

CHALLENGES

Nature Inspired Living

01

Creating a modern yet minimal brand identity

02

Ensuring the identity has a story to tell, like all architectural pieces

03

Maintaining a consistent visual identity across the website

04

Designing an identity that stands out in the market

SOLUTION

Modern Minimalism

Terra Lapis’ brand design thoughtfully integrates natural inspiration with modern aesthetics. The logo, inspired by the Japanese character for ‘tree,’ reflects the firm’s connection to wood and the environment, ingeniously incorporated as the letter ‘T.’ The letter ‘L’ adopts a minimal wireframe design, symbolizing both commercial and residential structures, adding a modern touch. This artistic fusion signifies Terra Lapis’ dedication to innovative architectural and interior design solutions. The brand’s color palette of black, white, and blue underscores its commitment to contemporary design, encapsulating a unique blend of nature and cutting-edge creativity.

Redesigning the Future

IDENTITY

Terra Lapis logo icon was inspired by the Japanese character, which translates to ‘tree.’ Given that the main material of the product is wood and as of the brands connection to nature and envirnoment, has been aligned to incorporate it as the letter “T”. Meanwhile, the letter l’ adopts a minimal wireframe design, serving as a captivating nod to both commercial and residential structures.

Mission

Motto

Vision

ICONOGRAPHY

Aesthetics designed to Elevate Brands

UI/UX

A seamless web experience to position Terra Lapis as a high-end Architectural firm

IMPACT

Harmonizing Global Aesthetics

The rebrand and new web design have propelled Terra Lapis to new heights, emphasizing its boutique status and unique fusion of international sophistication with local cultural sensitivity. The refreshed website showcases three decades of experience and cutting-edge technology, reinforcing Terra Lapis’ commitment to quality, transparency, and integrity in architectural design. This strategic update has attracted a discerning clientele and solidified Terra Lapis’ reputation as a leader in harmonizing global aesthetics with traditional values, making a significant impact in the industry.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Troogue

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Troogue isn’t just another platform; it’s a revolutionary movement reshaping the landscape of work freedom and efficiency for both individuals and enterprises alike. With its AI-powered assessments and commitment to bias-free dialogues, Troogue stands at the forefront of innovation, transforming the way we approach work.From timely payments and access to mentorship to valuable insights, mock interviews, and potential client partnerships, Troogue ensures that Troogers thrive no matter where they are located.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web UI/UX

INDUSTRY

Workforce Management

CHALLENGES

Supercharged
With The
Power Of AI

01

Balancing innovation with professionalism.

02

Conveying Trust and Security with design.

03

Organizing and presenting this content in a way that is easy to navigate and digest for users requires strategic content planning and layout design.

04

With users accessing websites from various devices and abilities, ensuring the website is mobile-friendly and meets accessibility standards can be challenging while maintaining a cohesive brand identity.

SOLUTION

The Epitome Of Modern Work Dynamics

At the heart of our branding is the logo – a seamless blend of a logomark and logotype that embodies their core values. The logomark, ingeniously crafted from the letters O, symbolizes pushing forward, pushing towards growth, a visual metaphor to empower every individual to reach their full potential. Paired with a dynamic color palette of vibrant gradients in pink, blue, and purple, our branding exudes energy, creativity, and innovation.

Uncovering Troogue: A Visual Quest Of Empowerment And Innovation

Uncovering Troogue:
A Visual Quest Of Empowerment And Innovation

IDENTITY

At the core of Troogue’s identity lies its logo – a harmonious fusion of a distinct logomark and logotype, representing the essence of their values. Crafted ingeniously from the letters O, the logomark embodies the ethos of pushing forward, propelling individuals towards growth and success. This visual metaphor encapsulates Troogue’s mission to empower every individual to realize their full potential. Complemented by a vibrant color palette featuring dynamic gradients of pink, blue, and purple, Troogue’s branding radiates energy, creativity, and innovation.

Aesthetics Designed To Match An Unmatched Vision

WEB UI/UX

A seamless web experience to position Grep as the Market leaders they are.

IMPACT

Troogue Vision For Empowerment And Collaboration

Troogue Vision For
Empowerment And
Collaboration

With this project, Troogue has the potential to transform the gig economy by empowering professionals with timely payments, mentorship, and client partnerships, while providing streamlined processes and access to diverse talent for enterprises. This innovative platform will foster collaboration and inclusivity, shaping a more dynamic and sustainable future for all involved.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Gyrus

ABOUT

Gyrus is a leading provider of Learning Management Systems (LMS), specializing in training for safety and compliance across critical industries like Government, Manufacturing, Healthcare, Utilities, and Construction. With a focus on innovation and personalized support, Gyrus ensures a prepared workforce for an ever-changing landscape.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

Learning Management Systems

CHALLENGES

Gateway to
Modern & Flexible Training

01

Maintaining a cohesive visual identity that works seamlessly across various digital and print mediums.

02

Balancing a sleek, modern look with the serious tone required by industries like healthcare and government.

03

Designing an intuitive user experience for a multi-page, feature-rich LMS product.

04

Meeting speculated timelines for UI/UX and development.

SOLUTION

Intuitive, Professional, Cohesive Design

We tackled the design challenges by creating a clean, professional visual identity that balances modern aesthetics with industry-specific seriousness. The minimalistic logomark effectively symbolizes innovation and higher-order thinking. We used harmonious blue and orange tones to reflect Gyrus’s values. For the UI/UX, we developed an intuitive, user-friendly interface that ensures seamless navigation across multiple pages, maintaining consistency and reliability throughout the platform.

Pioneering LMS For
 Critical Sectors

IDENTITY AND UI/UX

We crafted Gyrus’s UI/UX to be intuitive and user-friendly, ensuring seamless navigation across its extensive multi-page LMS platform. The design emphasizes clarity and efficiency, with a clean, professional look that maintains consistency. Our goal was to create an engaging, reliable experience that meets the needs of diverse, critical industries.

ICONOGRAPHY

Aesthetics Designed To Match an
Unmatched Vision

WEB UI/UX

A seamless web experience to position Gyrus as the Market leaders they are.

IMPACT

Enhanced credibility and engagement.

Our design for Gyrus’s visual identity and UI/UX enhanced their brand’s credibility and user experience. The intuitive interface and professional aesthetics fostered greater trust and engagement among users. This impactful transformation reinforced Gyrus’s reputation as a leader in LMS, driving customer satisfaction and supporting workforce development in critical industries.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Vibin’ Festival

ABOUT

Vibin’ Festival was conceptualized as the largest Gen-Next Festival in India, curated by TribeVibe – a property of BookMyShow, for students aged between 13-25. The aim of the festival was to create an event exclusively for and curated by the student community. The event was organized across 7 cities in India with 50+ top artists across genres like music, dance, stand-up, poetry, and much more, and stalls across categories like food, fashion, art, and gaming.

 

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development
  • Space Experience Design
  • Collateral Design
  • Performance Marketing
  • Video Production

INDUSTRY

Events & Entertainment

CHALLENGES

Get Everybody Vibin'

01

To create an impactful design that would resonate with the target audience.

02

To construct a seamless design system that could flow across all the elements of the brand, both online and offline, creating a cohesive and unforgettable experience.

03

To conceptualize the space experience and merchandise design that would create a clear winning differentiator among all the events in the category.

04

To design and develop an offbeat, easy-to-navigate website while ensuring never-before-seen designs with seamless content integration.

SOLUTION

Pop Culture
At The Core

We understood the importance of adding intricate elements to the overall design that would allow us to position the festival and connect with the youth and hence multiple Gen-Z elements and tonality were adapted seamlessly across all designs.

An Identity That Would
Set The Vibe

IDENTITY

To establish the identity of the brand, a font-based logo was chosen with a weighty font with elements that could be used across all fest-related collaterals. Artistic designs were created for artist introductions, and gen-z slang and tonality were adapted across all communication. The use of pop colour, artistic elements, and stickers across all the designs allowed us to position the festival effectively.

A Truly Immersive
Social Experience

SOCIAL MEDIA &
PERFORMANCE MARKETING

Play Video
Play Video

A Cool Browsing &
Shopping Experience

WEB & MERCH DESIGN

IMPACT

A Blockbuster
Event

Everything from the brand identity and communication to the space experience and website, really helped Vibin’ connect with its audience, making it a huge success, with several cities being sold out within days of the launch. 

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Rapyder

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Rapyder, a born in cloud company, was established in 2016 with a clear objective – to make cloud work for you. As a pioneer in the field, Rapyder Cloud Solutions has seen exponential growth year after year, evolving as a strategic and leading cloud consulting partner. Our journey has been focused on delivering optimal technology solutions that reduces costs, streamlines business processes, and provides significant business advantages.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development
  • Shopify Marketplace
  • Landing Pages

INDUSTRY

Cloud Computing

CHALLENGES

Simplifying Cloud with Expert Solutions

01

Balancing Technical Information with User-Friendly Design

02

Creating a suitable brand identity for the project

03

Maintaining a consistent visual identity and user experience across various platforms

04

Designing a functional yet aesthetic experience for users

SOLUTION

Consistency and Transparency in Communication

We designed a visual identity that positioned Rapyder as market leaders accompanied with a highly efficient user interface. An allusion to cloud technology is subtly integrated into the letter “E”, where the negative space forms a cloud shape. Overall, the design encapsulates the essence of Rapyder’s swift and efficient service, ensuring both accuracy and innovation in its delivery.

Rapid Ideas for Growing Brands

IDENTITY

The logo for Rapyder was crafted with a focus on conveying the rapidity of its service. The icon mirrors the fletching found at the rear of an arrow, symbolizing stability and precision during flight. The cube at the end represents the completion provided by Rapyder’s solutions. Additionally, the upward movement of the two arrows signifies growth.

ICONOGRAPHY

Aesthetics Designed To Match an
Unmatched Vision

UI/UX

A seamless web experience to position Rapyder as the Market leaders they are.

IMPACT

Cloud Simplified, Excellence Amplified

Rapyder’s innovative visual identity and intuitive UI/UX design have significantly enhanced their market presence, establishing them as a distinct leader in cloud consulting. The seamless integration of technical prowess with user-friendly design has boosted customer engagement and trust. Highlighting their achievements and expertise effectively, the design ensures a consistent and memorable brand experience across all platforms.

Make The Move

Addressing a significant gap in the market, True Cakes ensures that every cake is freshly made to order, countering the common issue of stale cakes found in […]

The post True Cakes appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
True Cakes

ABOUT

True Cakes, a brand in the bakery industry, specifically caters to the needs of vegetarians seeking trusted and exclusive eggless cakes for their special celebrations. Addressing a significant gap in the market, True Cakes ensures that every cake is freshly made to order, countering the common issue of stale cakes found in bulk production models. True Cakes stands out with its commitment to freshness and exclusivity, aiming to become the go-to choice for anyone wishing to make their loved ones feel truly special.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Packaging Design

INDUSTRY

Food Industry

CHALLENGES

Authentic Eggless Baking

01

Designing an identity that emphasizes on the eggless aspect of the brand.

02

Making the brand look unique in the market among other Dessert Stores.

03

Creating packaging to convey the feeling of fresh ingredients in a playful way.

04

Creating an identity that elevates the brand and makes it high-end.

SOLUTION

Playful Approach

True Cakes, an eggless cake brand, utilizes a branding strategy that captures the joy and celebratory spirit associated with cake-filled occasions. The soft and exuberant typeface mirrors the mood of events brimming with laughter and happiness, reflecting the brand’s core values. Custom-designed letter forms inject a unique essence into the brand, enhancing its playful and distinctive character. The bright color palette further amplifies this effect, ensuring that the brand feels fresh and inviting to customers. Together, these elements create a cohesive and appealing brand identity that stands out in the market, making True Cakes synonymous with delightful, eggless cake experiences.

Crafted Excellence

IDENTITY

A soft and exuberant typeface represents the mood of occasions that are celebrated with cakes and laughter. Customized letter form brings in an elemental essence of the brand and adds a playful touch.

IMPACT

We know how to crack it

The updated brand identity of TrueCakes, featuring a fresh and inviting aesthetic with a unique typeface and bright color palette, will significantly enhance its market impact. This distinctive look will boost brand recognition and recall, fostering trust and loyalty among customers, particularly vegetarians seeking quality eggless cakes. By appealing to a broader audience and reinforcing its premium positioning, TrueCakes can better differentiate itself from competitors and create a stronger emotional connection with customers. This cohesive and attractive branding supports TrueCakes’ ambition to become a nationwide leader in the bakery industry, driving increased market penetration and growth.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
LVNG

ABOUT

Lvng is a modern interior design brand that seamlessly blends sophistication with functionality. Specializing in high-end modular furniture, loose furniture, and home decor products, Lvng offers a range of design-centric pieces crafted from premium European raw materials. Unlike other Italian or German brands, Lvng’s offerings are competitively priced, making luxury accessible to Indian households. With a keen eye for contemporary aesthetics and a commitment to quality, Lvng redefines modern living spaces, bringing elegance and practicality together in perfect harmony.

SCOPE

  • Branding

INDUSTRY

Interior Design

CHALLENGES

Dreams to Beautiful Havens

01

Designing a modern yet minimal identity

02

Making the brand look unique as well as blend in seamlessly in the European Market

03

Creating an identity that works for all its sub-brands: Kitchens, Wardrobes, Furniture and Interiors

04

Aligning the brand with its motto

SOLUTION

Modern Minimalism

Modern minimalism rebranded Lvng by emphasizing clean lines, neutral palettes, and uncluttered spaces, highlighting the craftsmanship of its high-end modular and loose furniture. This minimalist approach accentuates the use of premium European materials, blending luxury and functionality. By focusing on essential elements, Lvng’s new identity makes refined living spaces stylish and accessible for Indian households.

Crafted Excellence

IDENTITY

The Lvng logo features a sleek, sans-serif font with strategic cuts, imparting a modern and edgy vibe. The color palette of blue, black, and white ensures a clean and elegant appearance, perfectly reflecting the brand’s commitment to contemporary sophistication and refined aesthetics. Additionally, the logo is designed to seamlessly incorporate all sub-brands under the Lvng umbrella, maintaining a cohesive and unified visual identity across the entire product range.

IMPACT

We Elevate Brands

The updated brand identity of Lvng, with its modern and minimalist logo, will significantly enhance the brand’s market presence and consumer perception. The sleek font and sophisticated color palette create a strong visual impact, making the brand instantly recognizable. This refined aesthetic appeals to contemporary tastes, attracting design-conscious consumers. The unified visual identity for all sub-brands strengthens brand consistency, fostering trust and loyalty. Overall, this modernized identity will differentiate Lvng from competitors, increase its appeal, and drive growth.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
DotMe

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

DotMe is a supercharged link-in-bio tool that’s set to revolutionise the Global Creator Ecosystem. It seamlessly integrates all your social and web accounts into one beautifully designed interface, keeping your bio dynamically updated with your latest content. Creators and brands can effortlessly share their engagement rates across all platforms, transforming their profiles into powerful media kits for collaborations.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web UI/UX
  • Webflow

INDUSTRY

Link-In-Bio

CHALLENGES

Choose the right
place to Boost
your content

01

Communicating the essence of the brand through an iconic logo.

02

Building a brand story and identity to which our key audience in the creative industry could relate to.

03

Simplifying a complex chain of communication and functionalities on the website.

04

Meeting speculated timelines for UI/UX and development.

SOLUTION

Crafting an Unique
and Relatable Brand Identity

In tackling these branding challenges, we took a modern and strategic approach to craft a spectacular brand identity that resonates with Gen Z users and the creative industry alike. By diving deep into the brand’s essence, we designed an iconic logo that captures its values and aspirations. Our brand narrative speaks directly to creative professionals, fostering a strong connection. We simplified website functionalities through user-centric design, ensuring a seamless experience.

Designed For The
Creator In You

IDENTITY

The logo for DotMe features a modified typeface, with the letter “O” cleverly depicted as a portal, symbolizing a gateway that transcends the audience into the world of the creator and everything that they have to offer. The color palette infuses the brand with a cool and edgy vibe while maintaining a modern aesthetic. Designed to resonate with Gen Z and similar audiences, the brand identity adopts a casual tone and design, yet remains trustworthy in its presentation.

Aesthetics Designed To Match An Unmatched Vision

WEBFLOW

The landing page for DotMe serves as a key marketing material – within this deliverable, the task was to compile all of information about the product and translate it through the brand story.

IMPACT

We work with
some great ideas

By crafting a compelling brand identity that resonates with their target audience, we’ve enabled them to stand out in a crowded market. Our strategic approach has not only attracted investors but has also driven significant user adoption since their launch. DotMe’s success serves as a testament to the power of effective branding in creating differentiation and fostering trust.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Grep

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

GREP tailors talent strategies for Global Capability Centers (GCCs) and Global In-House Centers (GICs), focusing on the staffing needs of Fortune 500-affiliated enterprises. As an ally in strategic workforce planning, GREP, a division of Intelliswift, combines innovative prowess with specialised talent solutions for impactful outcomes. Together with Intelliswift, they form a dynamic entity addressing cutting-edge technology solutions and strategic talent needs.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

Sourcing & Employment

CHALLENGES

Gateway to
Global Talent Solutions

01

Balancing innovation with professionalism.

02

Creating a suitable brand identity for the project.

03

Make it easy for users to understand GREP’s specialized talent solutions for GCCs and GICs through clear messaging and prominent placement of service offerings.

04

Meeting speculated timelines for UI/UX and development.

SOLUTION

Consistency And Transparency In Communication

The solution for Grep involved a comprehensive revamp of their brand identity, strategically designed to align with their values and goals. A clean and intuitive navigation menu was implemented for a smooth user flow. The website was designed with a mobile-first approach, ensuring seamless responsiveness across various screen sizes and devices.

Identities Build Character And Character Transforms Into Success

IDENTITY

GREP embodies the essence of exceeding expectations and delivering precise outcomes. The logo, featuring the greater than and equal to symbols, symbolizes GREP’s commitment to surpassing client needs or meeting them spot on. We opted for vibrant red to signify rapid growth and vitality. The 3D layers infuse modernity and depth into the design, reflecting GREP’s innovative spirit.

ICONOGRAPHY

Aesthetics Designed To Match An Unmatched Vision

WEB DEVELOPMENT

A seamless web experience to position Grep as the Market leaders they are.

IMPACT

Bringing meaningful change made simple

With the revamp, it is to become the leading consulting firm in India, recognizing unmatched talent solutions and dedication to clients. They aspire to set industry standards for innovation, integrity, and excellence, creating a future where clients thrive, their employees achieve their fullest potential, and their commitment to community and environmental stewardship resonate globally.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Peeyo

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Embarking on a creative journey with Peeyo, the vibrant canned mocktail drink brand, Ytx Solutions dived into a realm of refreshment and flavour. Peeyo’s commitment to delivering a delightful mocktail experience became the foundation for a comprehensive exploration of branding, visual identity, brand communication, packaging, web UI/UX, web development, and product photography.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Packaging
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development
  • Product Photography

INDUSTRY

  • Food and Beverages

CHALLENGES

Sip, Smile,
Repeat.

01

Deciphering and translating Peeyo’s essence into a cohesive visual identity.

02

Designing packaging that not only showcased the product but also communicated the brand’s essence.

03

Creating a harmonious colour palette to align with Peeyo’s unique canned mocktail packaging.

04

Balancing distinct flavour representations while maintaining a cohesive brand image across the product line.

SOLUTION

Navigating
These Challenges

Brandemic’s solution was a harmonious blend of creativity and strategy. The visual elements seamlessly intertwined with the brand’s narrative, with each mocktail flavour visually represented in a way that resonated with Peeyo’s lively and inviting personality. The packaging was crafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring it not only housed a refreshing drink but also became a canvas for Peeyo’s story.

Cheers to
Uncharted Flavors.

IDENTITY

Our approach to Peeyo’s branding was rooted in the idea that every sip should be an adventure. We crafted a visual identity that captured the essence of Peeyo’s diverse mocktail offerings, using vibrant colours, playful graphics, and a touch of sophistication. The brand now stands as a beacon of excitement and innovation in the mocktail market.

Unveil The Flavor
Symphony.

PACKAGING

The packaging design went beyond aesthetics; it became a storytelling medium. Each can be transformed into a mini-canvas, adorned with lively illustrations that mirror the flavours within.

Explore,
Click, Sip.

WEB DEVELOPMENNT

Brandemic extended the brand experience into the digital realm. The website was crafted with a user-centric approach, ensuring a seamless and visually engaging experience. From interactive flavour guides to a smooth online shopping process, every aspect of the web interface was designed to enhance the consumer’s journey.

Canned Mocktails
Made Accessible

By seamlessly blending technology with the brand’s essence, Ytx Solutions ensures that every click on the Peeyo website is an invitation to immerse oneself in the delightful world of canned mocktail bliss.

IMPACT

From Concept
To Cheers

The comprehensive transformation undertaken by Ytx Solutions resulted in Peeyo not just being a canned mocktail brand but a lifestyle. The revitalised branding, packaging, and digital presence resonated with both existing and new consumers. Peeyo now stands proudly on the shelves, inviting consumers to explore and indulge in the blissful world of crafted mocktail experiences. It’s not just a can; it’s a Peeyo moment waiting to be savoured with every sip.

Make The Move

LET'S COLLABORATE

REACH OUT

item.content:encoded:
Harihar

ABOUT

Harihar Cast Components, Earlier known as Smitha Enterprises, are in the Foundry Business since 1996. They are situated in Harihar, which is 280 KM from Bengaluru, The capital of Karnataka. They are one of the major players in supplying Cylinder Heads and Liners for the automotive industry. Harihar Cast Components, is headed by Mr MS ARUN who has a very rich experience in the Foundry Industry, Harihar Cast Components employees around 300+ people who have an experience of atleast 5+ years in the business.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Collaterals

INDUSTRY

Automotives

CHALLENGES

Balancing Tradition
With Modernity

01

Navigating the challenge of modernizing a legacy foundry business while preserving its traditional roots in the automotive industry.

02

Communicating the intricacies of casting services
through design.

Communicating the intricacies of casting services through design.

03

Striking a balance between a visually appealing design and a memorable, impactful representation of Harihar Cast Components in a competitive market.

04

Developing the branding to symbolize trust, strength, and a strong bond, encapsulating the essence of the company’s values and reliability.

SOLUTION

Forging
Excellence

Harihar Cast Components’ brand identity encapsulates a modern aesthetic for a legacy foundry business. Vibrant orange and grey tones evoke the cast iron process, creating a visually striking representation of the automotive casting industry. The brand icon, an H nestled within an emblem, conveys trust, strength, and a strong bond, symbolizing the company’s commitment to quality and reliability.

IMPACT

Bringing Purely
Positive Changes

The redesigned brand identity elevated Harihar Cast Components’ visual presence, establishing a modern yet authentic image. The use of distinctive colors and the iconic emblem contributed to increased brand recognition, emphasizing trust and strength. The collaterals effectively conveyed the company’s services, fostering a stronger connection with clients and reinforcing its position in the automotive casting sector.

Make The Move

item.title: Equipp

Equipp VISIT SITE ABOUT Equipp was conceptualized with the mission to make great tech accessible for anyone and everyone. Buying tech can be expensive, inefficient, and unsustainable. Equipp offers affordable subscriptions that are flexible enough to fit into our lives while being planet-friendly at the same time. Equipp is one of the first companies in […]

The post Equipp appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
Equipp

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Equipp was conceptualized with the mission to make great tech accessible for anyone and everyone. Buying tech can be expensive, inefficient, and unsustainable. Equipp offers affordable subscriptions that are flexible enough to fit into our lives while being planet-friendly at the same time. Equipp is one of the first companies in India to be renting out high-end products like laptops, iPads, PlayStations, and more via a web and mobile app.

SCOPE

  • Website UI/UX
  • App UI/UX
  • Brand Communication
  • Brand Identity

INDUSTRY

  • Tech Rental - B2B/B2C

CHALLENGES

Understanding The
 Industry In & Out

01

Understanding the rental model thoroughly to enable a smooth user experience.

02

Collaborating and understanding the tech stack and possibilities.

03

Our most complex task was building the KYC workflow as the amount of drop-offs that happen during the KYC process is very high.

04

To understand gaps in the competition and better it.

05

Understanding the checkout process for rental products.

USER PERSONAS

Deep Diving into Research

Our team did a user persona research of 50-60 individuals, between the range of 20-49, this ranged from students, working professionals, and heads of corporations.

Harsh

20 Years • Male • Engineering Undergrad/Freelancer • Delhi

WORKING HOURS

4-5 Hrs/day

BEHAVIOUR

  • Goes to his college during the day
  • Freelances at night as a video editor
  • Follows viral posts
  • Doesn’t take care of his health

PAIN POINTS

  • His laptop crashes when trying to run a heavy software
  • Doesn’t have enough money saved up for a new high-end laptop.

GOALS

His goals is to complete his college while working on his skills on the side – freelancing as a video editor. He wants a laptop that will enable him to take on huge projects.

Shikha

25 Years • Female • Business Owner • Bangalore

WORKING HOURS

14 Hrs/day

BEHAVIOUR

  • Recently started a new design agency
  • Has to do a lot of hiring
  • Follows entrepreneurs
  • Is ambitious

PAIN POINTS

  • Employees demand a laptop while joining
  • Lack of funds

GOALS

Her goals are to provide the best services to her clients and not be limited by the technology aspect.

Abhinav

24 Years • Male • Working Professional/Digital Marketer • Bangalore

WORKING HOURS

12 Hrs/day

BEHAVIOUR

  • Commutes for work
  • Struggles to keep up at work
  • Follows viral posts

PAIN POINTS

  • Laptop crashes a lot
  • Laptop heats up when trying to run ads
  • The laptop is buly and a pain to carry

GOALS

His goals are to excel at his work and not get frustrated and stressed while working.

Making Things
Interesting

ILLUSTRATIONS

We designed custom illustrations and motion animations to add an interesting dimension to an otherwise clean and minimal design.

CLEAN AND MINIMAL

The design was kept minimal with a lot of white space as we were directed to steer clear of dark themes, reflecting the exclusivity of their products.

Copper For A Touch Of Luxury

Solving For KYC

We built a system where if people did not have all the data and documents at one time they could come back later to start from where they left the KYC process.

Check This Out

We enabled an extremely easy-to-navigate checkout process, helping in driving conversions.

Synergetic Scaling

We designed custom illustrations with motion animation and custom icons to scale the identity to the website.

IMPACT

Making
The Smart-er Decision

The app solved a significant problem for individuals who wanted to own high-end electronic products but were financially limited. It also brought much-needed transparency to the tech rental market. The clean layouts and seamless design of the app and the website helped Equipp gain the right traction.

Make The Move

LET'S COLLABORATE

REACH OUT

Stuff

In contrast to the investment approach, where the effects of market unpredictability and various factors often lead to financial losses, QuantMomo advocates for adopting a rules-based investment system. […]

The post Quant Momo appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
Quant Momo

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

QuantMomo aims to provide individuals with the knowledge and tools they need to engage in investing using a structured and rule-based methodology. In contrast to the investment approach, where the effects of market unpredictability and various factors often lead to financial losses, QuantMomo advocates for adopting a rules-based investment system. They offer an array of products and services crafted to begin the application of rules-based investing. Among these are many algorithmic strategies designed to help investors in navigating the investment landscape. Also, an innovative app compatible with both mobile and desktop devices is a product pool they dip their hands into!

SCOPE

  • App UI/UX
  • Branding
  • Brand Communication
  • Brand Identity
  • Web UI/UX
  • Website Development

INDUSTRY

  • Finance & Trading

CHALLENGES

Building
Brand Equity

01

Algorithmic trading sounds complicated enough, and all the players in the segment have a very serious positioning with complicated communication. Hence, we wanted to do something totally different…

02

To position the brand as an easier and more effective alternative to traditional investing.

03

To make the brand convey their message without over-complicating the language and message.

04

To stand out against competitors and present a unique front with a fun yet informative interface.

USER PERSONAS

Diverse User Portfolio

Combining insights from QuantMomo along with our expertise and research, our UX was designed to enhance the overall experience of users of the website. We created multiple personas and performed rigorous user testing to bring the ultimate user experience to life. Infused with the core principles of QuantMomo’s disciplined methodology, we crafted an interface that connects with our users and equips them to effortlessly make well-informed decisions.

Avinash Kumar

38 Years • Female • B.Tech • Bangalore

BEHAVIOUR

Avinash Kumar is a 38-year-old male residing in Dubai, UAE. He holds a B.Tech degree and has spent most of his career working in the IT industry. Rajesh is approaching retirement and is looking for investment solutions that can help him secure his financial future and generate passive income.

BEHAVIOUR & PAIN POINTS

Avinash has limited experience in financial markets and is concerned about making costly investment mistakes. He seeks an investment advisor who can provide him with clear and straightforward investment strategies tailored to his risk tolerance.

GOALS

Avinash’s primary goal is to generate a stable source of passive income during retirement. He is interested in strategies that focus on wealth preservation while providing consistent returns to support his post-retirement lifestyle.

Aisha Patel

32 Years • Female • MBA • Hyderabad

BEHAVIOUR

Aisha is a 35-year-old female based in New York with an MBA background. She works in a corporate job with long hours and is passionate about financial planning. She values well-informed and data-driven investment decisions and is always on the lookout for opportunities to grow her wealth.

BEHAVIOUR & PAIN POINTS

Aisha is knowledgeable about finance but lacks the time to actively manage her investments due to her demanding career. She seeks an investment advisor who can provide her with rules-based strategies that align with her financial goals and risk tolerance.

GOALS

Aisha’s primary goal is to build a diversified investment portfolio that generates consistent returns over time. She is interested in strategies that minimize risk and offer long-term financial security.

Rahul Rajesh

25 Years • Male • MBBS • Mumbai

BEHAVIOUR

Rahul is a 32-year-old male based in Mumbai with a background in medicine, holding a MBBS degree. He practices medicine for approximately 5-6 hours a day at multiple locations in the city. His professional life keeps him occupied, and he values efficient investment advice that aligns with his busy schedule.

BEHAVIOUR & PAIN POINTS

Rahul seeks investment solutions that are easy to understand and implement, given his demanding work hours. He may not have the time to delve into complex financial strategies. He values simplicity and convenience in his investment choices.

GOALS

Rahul aims to build a financially secure future despite his busy schedule. He is looking for investment options that allow him to grow his wealth without requiring excessive time and effort on his part.

A Blue Chip
Investment

ILLUSTRATIONS

We used illustrations of a robotic momo to give the brand image a sense of whimsy while also not distracting from the overall message of the website. The Momo mascot was designed to effectively portray the ease of use of the platform.

NO SETTLEMENTS HERE

We wanted to show a website that flows as effortlessly as a rule-based approach to investing.

Uncomplicating The Communication

Enabling Interactions

We wanted to build and ensure engagement and intractability throughout the brand’s presence.

Hitting All Targets

WEB DEVELOPMENT

We worked on making the platform for QuantMomo look both visually attractive and fulfillingly informative. We used bold colours for bases and texts to make the information jump out of your screen and stay with you.

IMPACT

Set For
A Bull Run

Our work with QuantMomo proves that the right branding, communications and web development services can help in creating clear distinction and unique positioning. QuantMomo is seeing massive traction and is all set for a massive bull run.

Make The Move

LET'S COLLABORATE

REACH OUT

If you’re looking for a holistic agency to work on your big dream, just say the magic words!

More Good
Stuff

Their mission is to enhance the lives of vulnerable children by offering cutting-edge technology that simplifies care […]

The post Lief Care appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
Lief Care

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Lief is a care management company based in the United Kingdom. Lief is dedicated to providing innovative care management solutions that empower care providers to deliver efficient and streamlined care, reducing administrative burdens. Their mission is to enhance the lives of vulnerable children by offering cutting-edge technology that simplifies care management.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

Wellbeing & Care Management

CHALLENGES

Combining
Aesthetics With Functionality

01

Building a brand language that would elevate the personality of the brand.

02

Effectively communicating all the offerings of the brand.

03

Simplifying a complex chain of communication and functionalities on the website.

04

Communicating the essence of the brand through an iconic logo.

SOLUTION

Holistic
Design System

We created a clean and minimal design with a color palette that would make the brand’s identity subtle yet significant. We introduced sharp brand patterns that could flow across multiple brand collaterals, making the recall stronger.

An Iconic Logo

IDENTITY

Since Lief sounded a lot like leaf, we crafted a logo that created a recall in people’s minds. Another reason for choosing a leaf as the logo structure was because it signifies hope, growth, peace, and life, which also happens to be the alternate pronunciation of the word Lief (smart, eh?).

Handcrafted
Illustrations

WEB ILLUSTRATIONS

Since the entire website was kept pretty minimal due to the prominence of detailed content, we introduced custom illustrations to make the website more interesting and user-friendly.

Goal-Driven Website

WEB DEVELOPMENT

The website for Lief was carefully designed to effectively communicate all the offerings of the brand while focusing on building trust and positioning itself effectively.

IMPACT

A Well-Rounded
Branding Exercise

All the elements of the brand came together seamlessly, creating a holistic experience and establishing a strong identity for the brand, creating a solid positioning for Lief.

Make The Move

Untangle VISIT SITE ABOUT Untangle was a visionary project created with the intention of making quality therapy accessible to all. With a talented team of professionals, Untangle addresses any and all mental health concerns in a comfortable space. Based out of Dubai, UAE, they have an office built to provide comfort and therapy to all […]

The post Untangle appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
Untangle

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Untangle was a visionary project created with the intention of making quality therapy accessible to all. With a talented team of professionals, Untangle addresses any and all mental health concerns in a comfortable space. Based out of Dubai, UAE, they have an office built to provide comfort and therapy to all of their patients and they also provide their services online for convenience and accessibility. Along with professional help for individuals, they also assist in support group activities.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Web Design
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

Mental Health & Wellbeing

CHALLENGES

Thoughtful
Structuring

01

To make the brand look inviting in a way that brings comfort to potential consumers of the service, while also maintaining a professional image.

02

Creating seamless designs that make sense contextually and bring out the brand image of Untangle.

03

We had to make sure the message we conveyed through the website was clear and concise while maintaining a flow that leads potential consumers to opt for the service.

04

We also wanted to make the brand stand out as one-of-a-kind to ensure a long-lasting brand experience for all.

SOLUTION

Inviting And Comforting
Brand Language

Minimally designed illustrations that portray calmness and mental comfort with an iconic logo were our solutions for brand imaging. We also established the right target audience and started working towards appealing to their concerns and needs.

A Distinct Identity

IDENTITY

Establishing the right brand identity involved emulating two things in particular: comfort and credibility. We wanted to cement that the brand was for all and achieved doing so by bringing out these aspects of Untangle.

Crafted
With Detail

WEB ILLUSTRATIONS & ANIMATIONS

We used comforting custom illustrations to position the service well. The illustrations were crafted specifically to portray calmness. We also used motion animation in certain places to give the brand a unique and cozy feel.

Website That
Tells The Brand Story

WEB DEVELOPMENT

The website for Untangle was scaled and designed to make the brand stand out and also help streamline the process of getting in contact with the team. We also made it informative, helping consumers book their first sessions.

IMPACT

A Wholesome
Experience

With the branding and website design exercise, we were able to position Untangle effectively, giving it the right balance and appeal. Mental well-being is a space we are incredibly passionate about and working with ventures like Untangle, who really understand the depth of the subject is always a learning experience.

Make The Move

REACH OUT

item.title: Slip Slips
item.dc:creator: MM
item.description:
Slip Slips by Woke Nutrition VISIT SITE ABOUT Slip Slips by Woke Nutrition is a revolutionary nutrition supplement that uses the power of nano-science to make health fun and easy. It’s a stunning product that solves a massive problem – making the right nutrition easy and accessible. Slip Slips are little oral nano strips that […]

The post Slip Slips appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
Slip Slips

by Woke Nutrition

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Slip Slips by Woke Nutrition is a revolutionary nutrition supplement that uses the power of nano-science to make health fun and easy. It’s a stunning product that solves a massive problem – making the right nutrition easy and accessible. Slip Slips are little oral nano strips that you can place on your tongue and they quickly dissolve, providing you with all the nutrients and vitamins that you need to solve specific problems, like Hangovers, Hairfall, Insomnia, or PMS.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Packaging Design
  • Web Design
  • Web Development
  • Photography
  • UGCs

INDUSTRY

Nutrition - D2C

CHALLENGES

Cool & Funky

01

To position Slip Slips as a cool and funky nutrition brand without compromising its credibility.

02

Make it appealing to the gen-z and millennials as they were the target audience.

03

Effectively communicate how to consume the product.

04

Making sure the product was extremely accessible and portable.

SOLUTION

Solving
For Accessibility

The packaging design for this brand was a game-changer. Not only was it easy to transport and consume, but it was also a conversation starter. The magnetic flap on the 30s pack and the flap-lock system on the 10s pack added to the appeal of the product making it stand for innovation.

Hitting The Target

IDENTITY

Since the name was pretty big, we wanted to make the logo as compact as possible. When you look at the packaging and the entire feel of the brand, you can instantly understand who the product is for. We ensured that the product had a clear positioning that differentiated it from all the other brands in the market, and hence the entire brand had a very youthful tone, pop-colored packaging and theme, and a conversational communication style to create a direct connection with the audience in the age range 20-35.

LOGO VARIATIONS

Slip It, Forget It

PACKAGING

Before finalizing the current brand identity, we went through over 12 options with the client.

Why Should Health
Be Boring?

The packaging was as unique
as the product itself.

A Cool
Shopping Experience

WEB DEVELOPMENT

We built an e-commerce website for Woke Nutrition that would serve as their main platform for sales.

On A Mission To Make Health Cool

We went ahead and created a very unique-looking website that incorporated all the brand elements to build a strong recall. The tone of voice of the brand was used throughout the website, really solidifying what the brand stood for. The product photoshoots were scaled into web banners. Further, we integrated simple checkouts, seamless flow, and automated email systems to give a push to the entire sales process.

Ads That Work

UGCs

We created high-performing, low-cost ads just shot with a phone camera for Slip Slips, that let the people know of its benefits in a fun and engaging way. A script framework was developed to create a solid association and recall along with taking the apprehensions headon, reulting in a 2.6X ROAS and over 5000+ units being sold. We received great feedback from the audience about the ads, received massive engagement, and subsequent results. It helped the brand in gaining credibility and the trust of the masses in one of the trickies sectors in advertising – healthcare!
Play Video
Play Video

IMPACT

Starting
With A Bang

With our innovative packaging, we were able to successfully position Slip Slips as a new-age brand. The market received the design really well and we saw early adoption of the product. Thanks to our packaging and marketing strategy, we were able to sell 1600+ units within the first three months, even though the brand was much newer than most of the competitors in the market.

PS: Not to brag, but we bagged two golds, both National and South Zone during the FoxGlove Awards 2022 for best Packaging for Slip Slips.

Make The Move

LET'S COLLABORATE

REACH OUT

item.description:
UrbanInteriors by Urban Ladder ABOUT Urban Interiors is a business vertical by Urban Ladder specializing in interior design. Urban Interiors designs and customizes living spaces, and their goal is to customize your space into your ‘happy place’. From sprawling villas to tiny studios, they can help you transform your home into the one you’ve always […]

The post Urban Interiors appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
Urban
Interiors

by Urban Ladder

ABOUT

Urban Interiors is a business vertical by Urban Ladder specializing in interior design. Urban Interiors designs and customizes living spaces, and their goal is to customize your space into your ‘happy place’. From sprawling villas to tiny studios, they can help you transform your home into the one you’ve always dreamt of. Urban Interiors is looking to be a key player in the interior design industry. The Indian interior design market was worth USD 23.2 Billion in 2020 and is further projected to reach USD 38.2 Billion by 2027, at a CAGR of 7.4% during 2021-2027 (forecast period).

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Marketing Collaterals
  • Interior Branding

INDUSTRY

Interior Design - Service/B2B/B2C

CHALLENGES

Cracking The
Right Identity

01

Urban Ladder is a leader in the furniture space and hence cracking the right brand identity for Urban Interiors was a challenge.

02

Comprehensive competitive analysis of global moguls.

03

Creating isometric design layouts for all types of furniture and explainers and make it scalable.

04

To seamlessly integrate the brand language of Urban Ladder into Urban Interiors.

SOLUTION

Convenient & Functional

We wanted to make sure we were able to maintain the essence of the urban ladder brand, but we also wanted to bring in innovation. That’s why we chose modular and isometric flow for the iconography.

Geometric & Minimal

IDENTITY

The logo has been designed taking inspiration from modular and contemporary structure of staple pieces by Urban Interiors. The type is geometric and dynamic. Subtle elements like curved letters are infused within the brand wordmark to make it eye pleasing and comfortable to look at. To add dimension, elements resembling products provided are combined. The color palette is revised keeping in mind the past and future goals of Urban Ladder.

The Ladder To
A Hassle-Free Makeover

DIGITAL MARKETING COLLATERALS

The entire brand identity was scaled to the digital marketing collaterals like the landing page and the emailers.
The logomark in Urban Interiors is inspired by the structure and shape of services provided by the brand. Inside a modular home, the stairs are representative of moving towards innovation and comfort. Doning one’s house with urban interiors, they can expect to always be moving up with trends and evolving. It is inspired by the modular products and the best service and quality. Moreover, it gives the perfect subtle hint to Urban Ladder.

INTERIOR BRANDING

Innovative Designs
Packed With Comfort

We also did the entire interior branding of Urban Interiors by creating frames and explainers for their products. We designed ergonimcally designed wardrobes paying special attention to storage solutions as a way to cut down the clutter.

IMPACT

Innovative. Dynamic. Modern.

The UI and design system we built for Urban Ladder helped them successfully launch their interior wing, also giving them a competitive edge amongst the other prominent interior brands. The interior branding we did for Urban Interiors was scaled to Urban Ladder’s most salient interior stores. Huge marketing efforts were made to launch Urban Interiors using the vast database of Urban Ladder.

Make The Move

REACH OUT

item.content:encoded:
Dhatva

ABOUT

Dhatva was one of our first end-to-end projects which included our very first e-commerce website. This project holds a special place in our hearts. Dhatva is an organic skincare brand whose products are handcrafted, 100% organic, and are zero waste.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Brand Communication
  • Web Design
  • Web Development
  • Packaging Design
  • Photography

INDUSTRY

  • Skincare - D2C

CHALLENGES

Organic &
Eye-Catching

01

One of the primary challenges was to structure the design that catches the eye but maintains an overall organic theme that was at the core of the brand structure.

02

To position the brand effectively within the saturated organic skincare industry.

03

To build a UI/UX site that would meet the standards of the industry’s top skincare brands.

04

Storyboarding and sourcing the right props and location for the photoshoot.

05

Each SKU had a different ingredient and different uses, every single label was colour coded to match the ingredients and the design was customized to each of the products.

SOLUTION

Innovation + Nature

We created custom iconography for the brand. Furthermore, we came up with some smart concepts for jute bags for handmade soaps. And seed cards to propagate the brand’s contribution to nature.

Derived
 From Nature

IDENTITY

The icon is purely made keeping the botanical and organic nature of the product in mind and is entirely hand-drawn just how purely handmade the products are.

Made To Be
 Added To Your Cart

We went ahead and created a very unique-looking website that incorporated all the brand elements to build a strong recall. We emphasized the vision behind the company and the brand story to create a connection with the audience. Further, we integrated simple checkouts, seamless flow, and automated email systems to give a push to the entire sales process.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

IMPACT

Real-World Impact

Dhatva became an instant hit amongst people. The design was received really well. The client did sales of upward of 10 lakhs in a short span of time.

Make The Move

K’Luxe found an important market gap. The brand focused on sourcing the best raw materials from across […]

The post Kluxe appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
K'luxe

ABOUT

K’Luxe is a luxury skincare brand based out of Dubai, UAE, with a vision of enabling people across the globe to discover and reveal the best version of themselves, making them feel confident, bold, and empowered. K’Luxe found an important market gap. The brand focused on sourcing the best raw materials from across the globe and using them for their products. They were also highly focused on making all their products vegan and cruelty-free.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Packaging Design
  • Web Design
  • Web Development
  • Product Photography

INDUSTRY

  • Skincare - D2C

CHALLENGES

Positioning
Is Everything

01

To make the product stand out from hundreds of brands vying for consumer attention, each promising to deliver the perfect blend of style and function.

02

To position K’luxe as a luxury skincare brand that uses a minimalistic approach for its visual identity.

03

We had to ensure that the brand stood for luxury and minimalism but still stood out in a highly saturated market of skincare products.

04

The probability of looking similar to or getting mixed with other brands that used a gradient in their packaging identity.

SOLUTION

Simple & Significant

A minimal design with a touch of luxury to create an impression that is both trust-building and unforgettable. The logo was created as a simple typeface to keep minimalism in the focus and establish the brand as a luxury brand. The colours, gold, and terracotta, are inspired by the raw and glamorous aspects of nature. These neutral colours blend with other warm tones to give each product an identity of its own.

Minimal, Classy, Inspired By Nature

IDENTITY

K’luxe is a beauty and skincare brand that promises its users high quality and healthy products that would make them look and feel glamorous. Hence, the brand was positioned as a luxurious skincare brand that uses a minimalistic approach for its visual identity.

The colours, gold, and terracotta, were inspired by the raw and glamorous aspects of nature. These neutral colours blend with other warm tones to give each product an identity of its own.

LOGO VARIATIONS

The Devil In
The Details

PACKAGING

For a skincare brand operating in the modern age, its packaging is everything.
The gradient plays a key role in the appearance of each product. The fusion of terracotta with warm tones created a strong sense of grandeur, setting each product apart from the other while maintaining harmony within the visual identity. One of the biggest challenges that we faced during the process was the probability of looking similar to, or getting mixed with other brands that used a gradient in their packaging identity. To stand out from the crowd, geometrical elements were used in the layouts and other visual elements. The clean, sharp lines enhanced the luxurious appearance of the packaging, while maintaining a neat and minimal layout.

Seamless Experience

WEB DEVELOPMENT

The perfect mix of story-telling, brand recall, technology, and user experience.

Digital Real Estate That Resonates With The Brand Language

The K’Luxe website was built keeping all brand elements and the vibe of the brand in mind. We ensured a seamless user experience that minimised clicks and solidified the positioning.

IMPACT

Thought Driven Design That Creates Unforgettable Impression

With the entire branding exercise of K’Luxe, we were successfully able to position the product as a luxury product, and the market received the design really well. We saw early adoption of the product. We were able to generate sales for the products almost immediately though the brand was super new and the pricing was higher than most of the products in the market.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
BSS

ABOUT

BSS, a dedicated team of strategists, creative web designers, and tech enthusiasts, thrives on providing recruitment solutions to their clientele. Their pursuit of perfection is evident in every interaction, with client satisfaction reflected in improved balance sheets. With a skilled cadre of search executives and a motivated web development team, backed by SEO specialists, BSS firmly believes in the transformative power of people and digital expertise. They prioritise each client as an individual, emphasising their unique dreams and the potential for realisation through the synergy of human ingenuity and digital prowess.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Brand Communication
  • Video Production

INDUSTRY

Human Resources

CHALLENGES

Overcoming obstacles
Is Just Step 1

01

Creating an inviting and simple enough atmosphere for the website design of BSS.

02

Crafting a good experience for users of the website from start to end.

03

Getting the BSS message across in a clear and
concise manner.

04

Making a mark on social media with visual stimuli
for audiences.

SOLUTION

Navigating
These Challenges

Creating a harmonious digital ambience for the BSS website, ensuring a seamless user journey, distilling the essence of BSS into succinct messaging, and leaving a lasting impression on social media—all these challenges were met with dedication and creativity. Our team diligently sculpted an inviting and user-friendly web design, ensuring every click felt effortless. We crafted an immersive experience from the very first interaction to the final click, leaving users captivated.

A Brand’s
 Identity Is Everything

IDENTITY

Brandemic played a pivotal role in shaping BSS’s brand identity, amplifying our dedication to providing top-notch recruitment solutions. By delving into the essence of BSS’s core values and services, Ytx Solutions helped crystallize their image as a team of forward-thinking strategists, imaginative web designers, and tech aficionados. Ytx Solutions spotlighted the expertise within BSS using language, colour and the right messaging. This resulted in highlighting their talented search executives, motivated web development team, and SEO specialists, all aligning with the belief in the transformative power of human talent and digital prowess.

A Smooth
Shopping Experience

BRAND FILM

Brandemic also helped in filming a brand video for BSS highlighting the importance of what they do. We helped in creating a brand video that emphasised on what the right recruitment can do for the right kinds of companies. The video brings up the relevance of putting the right man on the right job and keeps the essence of BSS alive all through.

IMPACT

Changing
One Step At A Time

Brandemic’s comprehensive approach to handling branding, UI, and web development for BSS has had a profound impact. Our expertise has not only elevated BSS’s visual identity and online presence but has also reinforced its commitment to excellence in every client interaction. With a cohesive and visually appealing brand image, a user-friendly interface, and a well-designed website, BSS has experienced increased brand recognition, enhanced user engagement, and improved accessibility to its services.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Realtap

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Real Tap is an award-winning luxury real estate brokerage firm from Bangalore. They cater to the most discerning clientele with a desire and demand for luxury real estate. Luxury real estate is undoubtedly one of the most exciting sectors to be a part of, so it’s no surprise that there are extremely few people who have made their mark in this competitive industry. To penetrate Luxury Real Estate you need to exhibit qualities like being trustworthy and offering quality service along with an innovative approach.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Brand Identity
  • Web UI/UX
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

Real Estate - B2C

CHALLENGES

Penetrating
 The Luxury Real Estate Market

01

Establishing Realtap as a luxury real estate brand.

02

The website needed a specific complex property filtration feature.

03

Bringing a touch of class and luxury to the brand because it was targeted towards NRIs and HNIs.

04

A special custom backend had to be built with functionalities that allowed the monitoring and updating of properties seamlessly.

SOLUTION

Appearances Matter

When you try to understand the consumer base for Realtap, it will appear very obvious that most of the target customer base would be high-end wealthy individuals with fine taste, and for them appearance matters… A lot! While branding Realtap, we were focused on creating an identity that reflected class, simplicity, and luxury.

Minimal
Yet Sophisticated

IDENTITY

The entire brand identity of Realtap, specifically the logo is a classic blend of minimalistic yet sophisticated type form focusing on the letter ‘A’ for distinction, with only one small embellishment to make it stand apart from any other symbol – golden lining running across its length culminating in what can easily be interpreted as protection or boundaries, symbolized by the base triangle. The sharp simplicity makes this elegant house emblematic of Grace and Discernment something truly special, sure to catch anyone’s eye.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

Class & Luxury

The Realtap website was designed to reflect class and luxury with a simple, sleek design for an enhanced experience. The website is also extremely easy to navigate and effective for lead generation. Custom filters allow you to see homes for sale in a new light while immersive banner images add depth of field so every detail stands out beautifully.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

IMPACT

Real World
Pay-Offs

The Realtap project was such a success that the client came back for another project within the same vertical.
PS: The Realtap website also won two website design awards – Foxglove and the Big Bang Awards.

Make The Move

item.title: OmRx
item.dc:creator: MM
item.description:
OmRx ABOUT OmRx is a visionary attempt to create a mobile app that could solve some of the biggest issues in healthcare faced by medical practitioners including patient record management, appointment management, referral tracking, etc. We managed to build an entire health management system inside a mobile app which connects the entire healthcare ecosystem keeping […]

The post OmRx appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
OmRx

ABOUT

OmRx is a visionary attempt to create a mobile app that could solve some of the biggest issues in healthcare faced by medical practitioners including patient record management, appointment management, referral tracking, etc. We managed to build an entire health management system inside a mobile app which connects the entire healthcare ecosystem keeping the doctor as the center of the ecosystem. We created and designed the workflow and the UI/UX design for the OmRx suite of mobile applications – this included individual apps for doctors, patients, pharmacists, lab technicians, and hospitals.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • User Research
  • App UI/UX
  • Web UI/UX
  • Brand Communication
  • Visual Identity

INDUSTRY

  • MedTech - B2B/B2C

The
Thought Process

IDENTITY

Colour coding has been a major aspect of branding the OmRx suite of apps as the product had to scale into a huge feature set and multiple apps within a suite.

The circle in the OmRx logo represents the healthcare ecosystem and the fingerprint marks on the rims represent how each medical case is unique to itself. The center icon is kept dynamic to represent the app function within the suite.

CHALLENGES

An Entire EMR System
Inside An App Suite

01

One of our biggest challenges was solving for easy and seamless navigation.

02

Working with the tech team to figure out the various possibilities and challenges of implementation.

03

To enable a suitable appointment and communication system between doctors, patients, labs, and pharmacies.

04

Linking the entire suite to seamlessly function with each other.

USER PERSONAS

Figuring Out Gaps In The Market

Our team did a user persona research of 50-60 individuals, this ranged from doctors, lab technicians, hospital owners, and patients.

Vamshi Madan

26 • Years • Male • MBBS • Mumbai

PRACTICE HOURS

5-6 Hrs/day

PRACTICE LOCATION

Multiple

BEHAVIOUR

  • Commutes a lot between locations
  • Chats with patients on whatsapp
  • Makes hand-written prescriptions

PAIN POINTS

  • Less revenue
  • Lots of documents to manage
  • Managing patient queues

GOALS

Vamshi’s goals are to manage his multiple practice locations, streamlining the medical records of his patients that are all over the place. And driving more revenue to his practices.

Radhika Kumar

30 Years • Female • MBBS • Gurgaon

PRACTICE HOURS

6-8 Hrs/day

PRACTICE LOCATION

Single

BEHAVIOUR

  • Commutes a lot between locations
  • Chats with patients on whatsapp
  • Makes hand-written prescriptions
  • Doesn’t control his patient’s access to him

PAIN POINTS

  • Less revenue
  • Lots of documents to manage
  • Managing patient queues
  • Patients constantly messaging on whatsapp

GOALS

Radhika’s goals are to manage her patient queues effectively, streamlining the medical records of her patients that are all over the place. And driving more revenue to her practice.

Abhimanyu D

36 Years • Male • Lab Technician • Lucknow

PRACTICE HOURS

8 Hrs/day

PRACTICE LOCATION

Single

BEHAVIOUR

  • Reads the newspaper
  • Alert during operational hours

PAIN POINTS

  • Stressful work environment
  • Feels so busy
  • Not enough time with family
  • Messed up timelines of lab records

GOALS

To drive more business to his lab and to streamline lab records.

Ramesh R

40 Years • Male • IT Professional • Bangalore

PRACTICE HOURS

8 Hrs/day

BEHAVIOUR

  • Shops online
  • Exercises regularly
  • Regularly follows viral posts

PAIN POINTS

  • Medical records are all over the place
  • Hard to contact his doctor
  • Test reports don’t come on time

GOALS

To take care of his health, be in constant touch with his healthcare professional, and sort his medical records.

HI-FI PROTOTYPES

The homepage is broken down into cubicle systems. This enables scale and allows easy navigation.

Easy To Use & Scale

Connecting Doctors,
Patients, Labs, And Pharmacies

The app ensures seamless connectivity between the patient and his/her doctor, labs, and pharmacies via a simple chat system and smooth information exchange and storage.

Better Than Real Life

The appointment system is broken down into tokens and slot systems exactly how it works in real life.

The doctor can see all the patients waiting for him through the app.

Accounting Made Easy

The app can track all the accounting data for the doctor making it easy to have all records in one place.

Growing A Community

The OmRx app enables doctors to refer patients to one another based on their expertise and specialties. Thus, resulting in enhanced patient care and community growth.

Medical Reports On
Your Fingertips

Keep A Track Of Orders

It also enables sharing reports and orders between the doctor and OmRx app suite.

Connect With Doctors

The Connect app (for patients) helps patients to stay connected to their doctors. It enables a one-on-one interaction between the patient and the doctor through a chat interface.

Tokens & Slots

The patients can easily get their tokens and book a slot. This enabled less waiting time and a reduction in human dependence.

One Tap Away

The Connect app enables video calling between doctors and patients.

The patient can access all his records in one place.

Though the patient will get access to the doctor through text chat and video chat, the control would still be with the doctor.

As we created the suite, keeping the doctor as the center of the ecosystem.

No More Queues

Easy Access

The OmRx app enables the digitization of health data, accounting, and receptionist access across multiple practice locations. This allows the doctor to handle his hospital patients and personal clinic patients, and manage time better creating a healthy work-life balance along with enhanced patient care.

IMPACT

Changing
The System

In a very short time, over 3000 doctors joined the platform and the company was able to raise venture capital for their future build based on the UI design that we provided them.

Make The Move

REACH OUT

The Coconext project was tricky since it required us to position the product strongly for a particular […]

The post Coco Next appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
Coconext

ABOUT

A project from the FMCG sector, but this time with a crazy twist. We were approached by Coconext team to build their design and structural framework, along with store branding, Website User Interface, and marketing plan.

The Coconext project was tricky since it required us to position the product strongly for a particular market segment. There were complexities as the product was being sold in three different models kiosks, subscriptions, and a flagship store. Giving a unified brand identity that was fun, quirky and chill was one of the most challenging yet fun tasks we’ve had at Ytx Solutions.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web UI/UX
  • Brand Communication
  • Visual Identity
  • Collateral Design

INDUSTRY

FMCG - D2C/B2B

CHALLENGES

Positioning
Is Everything

01

To position the product strategically for a particular market segment.

02

Give a unified brand identity that was fun, futuristic, and had a tropical vibe.

03

The logo had to be minimalistic because the same logo would be heat-sealed on the coconuts and details could get lost while doing so.

04

The same identity had to scale across multiple models.

SOLUTION

Fun, Futuristic, & Tropical

The service of the brand cools down people, that being the main selling point something more tech-savvy/modem/classic/retro won’t fit the brand’s motives. The design is developed around PSYCHEDELIC GOLD VIBES. TROPICAL. BEACH. PLAYFUL. MULTI USER GROUP to arrive at a very minimal simple and easy-to-scale typeface and an icon-based logo. These keywords also helped in finding the appropriate colors.

As Quirky
As It Gets

IDENTITY

We worked with Coconext to create effective brand positioning strategies and a holistic design system. We created over 20 iterations of the logo to arrive at the final design. We paired it with a quirky tone of voice and two brand mascots – Coco & Loco.

Quirky &
Minimal (How?)

WEB UI

The UI design for Coconext was kept clean and minimal with a focus on easy navigation. However, the content gave it a touch of quirkiness to create uniformity in communication across all brand collaterals creating a strong brand voice. It had multiple touchpoints and multiple business models that we had to simplify in terms of navigation and understanding.

IMPACT

Go Loco
With Coco

Coconext’s’ design language was an instant hit. People recognised the whole vibe of the brand and associated it with a fun and chill brand that does innovative things. The branding became an inspiration for people in the city of Mysore as it made them realise the value of creating a brand language and a story. The mascots Loco and Coco were used across all the marketing activities making the brand gain popularity amongst their target audience.

Make The Move

REACH OUT

EOSGlobe VISIT SITE ABOUT EOSGlobe is a business process management company offering high-quality services powered by cutting-edge digital technologies. With over two decades of extensive domain expertise across industry verticals and a robust digital footprint, they are committed to providing strategic partnerships to their clients, helping them transform their business, optimize costs, and boost productivity. […]

item.content:encoded:
EOSGlobe

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

EOSGlobe is a business process management company offering high-quality services powered by cutting-edge digital technologies. With over two decades of extensive domain expertise across industry verticals and a robust digital footprint, they are committed to providing strategic partnerships to their clients, helping them transform their business, optimize costs, and boost productivity. EOSGlobe is a global enterprise with offices in multiple locations having a diverse business portfolio comprising Next-Gen BPO and KPO services.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Brand Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Web Design
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

BPO - Service/B2B

CHALLENGES

Escalating
 The Brand

01

Since EOS was a global brand and a legacy, the identity had to maintain the commanding identity that could escalate the brand to global stature.

02

It was challenging to convince the clients to move away from their old colour palette and identity as it was outdated and the brand needed a complete repositioning.

03

To research and create content that required technical expertise and an in-depth understanding of client’s business verticals.

04

Understanding the BPO industry thoroughly and incorporating the stakeholders vision with our creativity and innovation.

SOLUTION

Not Sticking To
The Brief

The client initially wanted us to alter the logo to reposition the brand but after a thorough discussion, we decided to completely revamp the entire brand identity to give it an all-new look and feel that would help us position EOS as a global and futuristic technology brand.

Always Evolving

IDENTITY

The logo was created with the intention of establishing the business as a globally transformational business that is always expanding and evolving to adapt to and support continual technological advances. As a result, we used a flowing infinite structure in our logo to represent flexibility, growth, and evolution. The globe’s design emphasizes the world’s modern technological view.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

Making An Impact

We created an impactful website to showcase the offerings of EOS Globe. Custom illustrations were added throughout the website. The website was also extremely easy to navigate and effective for lead generation. The tone of voice used throughout the website was one of authority and credibility.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

IMPACT

A Fresh Identity

The revamped brand identity was scaled across their website and other collateral. The fresh brand identity was received very well by the industry. The revamp allowed EOS to effectively position and enter the American market.

Make The Move
