Capup VISIT SITE ABOUT Capup is a startup in the FinTech space based out of Bangalore that helps startups, MSMEs, and corporates raise capital, provide liquidity solutions, and access alternate investment opportunities. Capup approached Ytx Solutions to reconstruct its brand identity and revamp its website. Capup wanted us to create a website with clear communication and […]

The post Capup appeared first on Brandemic.
item.content:encoded:
Capup

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Capup is a startup in the FinTech space based out of Bangalore that helps startups, MSMEs, and corporates raise capital, provide liquidity solutions, and access alternate investment opportunities. Capup approached Ytx Solutions to reconstruct its brand identity and revamp its website. Capup wanted us to create a website with clear communication and an easy-to-use interface with a seamless flow focusing on product education and trust-building.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Web App UI/UX
  • Web Design
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

  • FinTech - B2B/B2C

CHALLENGES

Positioning
Is Everything

01

We had to create an effective positioning for Capup that would allow it to be synonymous with ‘trust-worthy’ and ‘technologically advanced’.

02

The website had to be designed in a way that is reinstated with both the demand and supply side, which meant the website needed to educate companies looking to raise capital or liquidity solutions and consumers looking to invest in alternate investments for high-risk and high-reward.

03

Further, there were multiple complex products that Capup was offering and hence Ytx Solutions was brought in to simplify the communication and make the entire offering attractive and exciting.

04

The entire user flow had to be seamless to allow people to easily navigate through the website, the core objective was to make it extremely easy for visitors to convert to clients.

SOLUTION

Clean, Crisp, & Clear

With the above-stated challenges, we did a deep-dive competitor analysis and understood that we needed to position the offerings in a way that would generate interest and use social proof along with the company’s achievements in order to drive conversion.

We used a clean layout with white spacing and illustrations to explain the product and its benefits. Traditionally, all finance-related websites were extremely text-heavy. We wanted visitors to get curious about the product and generate curiosity, hence we refrained from explaining too much on the entire website, instead, we opted to make it extremely simple and combined the design with a punchy copy and important statistics to communicate effectively, establish the brand and its offerings.

To make the website more interactive, we also added animations to the illustrations throughout the website. We designed custom icons that helped in effective communication and keeping the website crisp.

Growth & Scale

IDENTITY

The brand identity we designed for Capup was focused on showcasing growth. The logo itself is a symbol of growth. Furthermore, the icon in the logo was created with segmentation and color differentiation to depict the diverse sectors that Capup works with.

Interactive & Optimized

WEB DEVELOPMENT

For developing Capup’s website, we scaled their brand guide. The target audience was young startups and MNCs. The website was designed to be interactive and used Lottie animations. A form was built for the filtration of data and maintaining a database. The whole website was tablet and mobile-optimized.

Tech Made Simple

UI DESIGN

Capup needed a clean, easy-to-use interface for their two tech dashboards. We designed a UI that was simple enough that anyone could navigate it, but still gave the user the ability to dig deeper into the data they were looking for.

IMPACT

We Work With
Some Great Ideas

In addition to the main website and branding, we also got the mandate to design the UI for the product extension – a dashboard that gives insights on how an investor’s investment has been performing (you would be able to access this after signing up for Capup) which followed the same design language and philosophy. The entire facelift made the user retention increase several folds.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
EMO

ABOUT

EMO is a deep-tech mobility firm that is building safe, powerful battery packs to enable mass EV adoption. EMO’s mission is to design, develop & commercialize cutting-edge technology for the masses, focusing on safety, reliability & performance.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Brand Communication
  • Web UI
  • Video Production

INDUSTRY

EV - B2B

CHALLENGES

Positioning
Is Everything

01

To make the brand look futuristic as well as minimal at the same time.

02

To stand out from the other players in the EV market.

03

To make the typography strike a balance between legibility and interest.

04

To position EMO as a highly futuristic tech brand.

SOLUTION

Minimal. Classy. Electric.

The logo is a minimalistic design with a touch of futurism to create an impression that is both trust-building and vibrant. The logo was created as a typeface to keep minimalism in the focus and establish the brand as a futuristic brand. Going in the typeface direction also let the logo be more visible. The colours cerulean blue and alice blue, used for the gradient, are inspired by electricity, which is usually represented by the colour blue.

Crisp And Clear

IDENTITY

We used white spaces, gradients, and tints to carefully craft EMO’s brand identity.

More Than
Just A Logo

ICONOGRAPHY

The elements of the logo were also scaled into iconography. We created dynamism with the letter ‘O’ for it to be scaled into elements from the core business line making it identifiable with the EV industry.
Play Video

Designed
For Tomorrow

WEB UI

Minimalism
At Its Best

We built the EMO website with a clear focus on the brand’s image and website elements. We made sure that the site was easy to navigate, with minimal clicks needed to get from one page to another. We also ensured that all interactions had some touch of futurism.

IMPACT

Futuristic Design
 That Sets The Brand Tone

With the entire branding exercise of EMO, we were successfully able to position the product as a futuristic and deep-tech brand, and the market received the design really well.

The design reflects the core values of the company: technology, innovation, and a mission to commercialize cutting-edge technology for the masses.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
UnlistedKart

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

UnlistedKart is a technology-first unlisted equity market-making platform, enabling wealth managers & investors to generate wealth using opportunities yet to be discovered by broader markets. Unlistedkart wanted to be one of the first players in the unlisted market space to have an app that was state-of-the-art with top-notch user experience.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Visual Identity
  • Web UI/UX
  • App UI/UX

INDUSTRY

FinTech - B2B/B2C

CHALLENGES

Reskinning
 The Entire App

01

Understanding the unlisted market and its complexities.

02

Making the navigation easy.

03

Collaborating and understanding the tech stack and possibilities such as what APIs are being used and what has to be built from scratch.

04

Our most complex task was building the KYC workflow as the number of drop-offs that happen during the KYC process is very high.

05

Decoding the problems in the older UI.

HI-FI PROTOTYPES

We went with a dark theme. The client preferred pop purple for a fresh and gen-z look. Our in-house design team also did custom illustrations with motion animation to match the same thought process.

A New-Age Look & Feel

Portfolio Management
Made Easy

We enabled portfolio management between holdings and orders. We also enabled keeping a track of completed and pending transactions. The new-app design ensured a seamless user experience for all its users.

Solved One Of The Biggest Problems
In FinTech Apps

We built a system where if people did not have all the data and documents at one time they could come back later to start from where they left the KYC process.

IMPACT

Changing The Game

The number of transactions happening on the app went up significantly along with the stickiness of the app.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
BTR Farms

ABOUT

BTR farms or Back To Roots farm is a flagship farmhouse project in Hosur, Tamil Nadu from the Naivedya Group based out of Bangalore. A haven for city dwellers to experience the serenity of nature, BTR farms is a 25-acre destination if one desires peace without distractions.

BTR Farms offers visitors the chance to experience mother nature in its purest form with organic produce and wildlife that will surely feed your appetite for adventure. You can live a thoughtfully planned farmland life in a pollution-free environment complete with organic farms, nature trails, water bodies, and serene views. It’s the perfect getaway.

SCOPE

  • Brochure Design

INDUSTRY

  • Real Estate - B2C

CHALLENGES

Making It
Stand Out

01

To visualize the entire story before moving into illustrations.

02

Keeping the brochure extremely detailed.

03

Setting an illustration style that would convey a rustic and minimalistic feel.

04

The 3-D top view was challenging to create because each of the illustrations had to be designed at a 45-60 degree angle.

SOLUTION

A Scalable Experience

The entire brochure was custom designed with illustrations and animated characters, the character and animations were structured in a way that could scale across all projects of BTR farms. Furthermore, the animated experience adds to the entire buying experience for the investors.

An Entire
Animated Experience

IDENTITY

The brochure project was extremely interesting, we wanted to animate the entire experience with a Farmville kind of theme – a famous Facebook strategy game from the 2000s. The design would help position the brand extremely differently, in a clogged market of real estate companies that try to focus on trust and excellence, innovation is somewhat lost and unseen.

Introducing
BTR

INFOGRAPHICS

The brochure was extremely detailed, showcasing life at BTR Farms through a custom map.

IMPACT

Setting A Standard

The brochure was printed and distributed to over 5000 prospects. Our clients also used this design to scale the BTR website. The BTR farm project has inspired many prominent real-estate companies to use the design style created by Ytx Solutions.

Make The Move

item.content:encoded:
Natureville

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Natureville Holistic Wellness Centre acts as the one-stop resource for all health and wellness needs. It taps into the true healing powers of nature to help one prevent and, in most cases, reverse chronic lifestyle diseases through nutrition consultations and natural healing methods such as whole (unprocessed and unrefined) plant-based foods, natural herbs, correct supplementation, lymphatic massages, acupuncture, energy healings, yoga, pilates, tai-chi, etc.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Brand Identity
  • Web Design
  • Web Development

INDUSTRY

Wellness - Service/B2C

CHALLENGES

Crafting
An Immersive Experience

01

To effectively position Natureville as a brand that is deeply connected to nature.

02

Create a scalable system to align the various aspects within the brand such as the cafe, and their future sub-brands under the same umbrella.

03

Create a distinct minimal identity that brings out the thought process of minimalism, something that the brand deeply resonates with.

04

Design an immersive experience and clean structural layout for an information-rich website.

SOLUTION

Elegant & Iconic

The visual identity involved a creative narrative that translates the brand’s essence and values into an elegant and iconic logo. The design language was developed into an ecosystem that is adaptable throughout the centre. The colour palette was chosen to give a feel of a nature-connected holistic ecosystem with a luxury feel to it. We chose to take the route of line art combining elements of nature, nutrition, and health to create a logo that encompassed the entire thought process behind the firm.

Derived
 From Nature

IDENTITY

Natureville is a place where culture and hospitality sync, providing an immersive and holistic experience. The visual and creative narrative translates the brand’s essence and values into an elegant and iconic logo. The design language is developed into an ecosystem that is adaptable throughout the centre.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

Showcasing Offerings

We created a neat and clean website to really segment the offerings of Natureville. Subtle animations were added throughout the website. The website was also extremely easy to navigate and effective for lead generation.

WEB DEVELOPMENT

IMPACT

A Holistic
Way To Health

Natureville has quickly become one of the most popular holistic wellness centres in the city of Bangalore with a recurring clientele.

Make The Move
